description.value:
Special: Blast (10)

Note: Planted in Solid Ground or Walls via a large spike. Power Generator is good for 1 Hour. Once activated, damage repeats every round, and increases by 1d10 every 10 rounds. Attempting to approach it whilst its operating requires -30 Agility Test or be knocked down and be dealt half current damage it is producing.
